caption.p: The harvested biomass (g) of the three species in each treatment. The horizontal axis represents nitrogen and light treatments: N+Shade, elevated nitrogen and 65% shaded; N, elevated nitrogen and natural sunlight; Shade, ambient nitrogen and 65% shaded; Control, ambient nitrogen and natural sunlight. Culture: Single, one-plant-culture; Mono, monoculture; Mix, Mixed culture. Values are means ± SE.
